Description: Left hand section of a green glazed faience scarab, elytra marked and humeral callosities present, pierced longitudinally, base inscribed with cartouche containing prenomen.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Dr David George Hogarth
Bibliographic references: Hall 1913 / Catalogue of Egyptian scarabs, etc. in the British Museum (799)
Ryan 1988 / The Archaeological Excavations of David George Hogarth at Asyut, Egypt 1906/7 (9-10)
